// @flow import React from 'react'; import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // images import profileImg from '../../assets/images/users/avatar-1.jpg'; const UserBox = (): React$Element => { return (

Dominic Keller

Founder

{' '}

About Me :

Hi I'm Johnathn Deo,has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type.

Full Name : Geneva D. McKnight

Mobile : (123) 123 1234

Email : user@email.domain

Location : USA

); }; export default UserBox;
